verbs.description: [ARG0: iran ally hezbollah] [V: pays] [ARG2: syrian rebels] [ARG1: to switch sides] iran ally hezbollah is paying former u s -backed rebels to join its growing force in southern syria deepening its presence near israel border after appearing to withdraw to avoid israeli airstrikes according to activists and a former rebel commander poland israel iran ally hezbollah syrian government hezbollah syrian army russia syrian observatory assad government syria commander u s
